actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, pay claims for damage to a water well, spring, or artesian well use as a water supply, if construction or operation of any segment of the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway project is the cause of said damage.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to compensate owners or authorized users for actual damage, including diminution in land value, to any water, spring, or artesian well caused by the construction of the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway project in Alabama, Mississippi, and Tennessee.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, pay claims for damage to a water well, spring, or artesian well use as a water supply, if construction or operation of any segment of the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway project is the cause of said damage.
